navicom/mainpage.py

00001 """
00002 #\mainpage navicom package documentation
00003 The navicom package intends to provide standard methods to visualise high-throughput data in NaviCell web service. It also provide several processing method to get some extra meaning out of the data.
00004 
00005 \author Mathurin Dorel
00006 \par License:\n GNU Public License.
00007 
00008 \section start Getting started
00009 
00010 The communication with NaviCell web service, and data processing are performed by the \ref navicom::navicom::NaviCom "NaviCom" class, which can be initialised with a simple NaviCell map URL.
00011 \code
00012 nc = NaviCom(map_url='https://navicell.curie.fr/navicell/maps/cellcycle/master/index.php')
00013 \endcode
00014 Data and annotations can then be loaded in the \ref navicom::navicom::NaviCom "NaviCom" object.
00015 \code
00016 nc.loadData("data/Ovarian_Serous_Cystadenocarcinoma_TCGA_Nature_2011.txt")
00017 \endcode
00018 Two formats are accepted:
00019     \li a matrix format where data are represented as matrix, with explicit rows and columns names. The first row has to start by GENE (for data) or NAME (for annotations);
00020     \li a set of matrix format where each matrix is separated by a header line expliciting the type of data and starting with M (data) or ANNOTATIONS (annotations).
00021 
00022 After being loaded, data and annotations can be easily controlled:
00023 \code
00024 nc.listData()
00025 nc.listAnnotations()
00026 \endcode
00027 
00028 \subsection display_config Display configuration
00029 
00030 The displays in the NaviCell map can be easily configured with the \ref navicom::displayConfig::DisplayConfig "DisplayConfig" class. It can be provided to the \ref navicom::navicom::NaviCom "NaviCom" class.
00031 \code
00032 display_config = DisplayConfig(5, zero_color="000000", na_color="ffffff", na_size=0)
00033 nc = NaviCom(map_url='https://navicell.curie.fr/navicell/maps/cellcycle/master/index.php', display_config)
00034 \endcode
00035 
00036 \subsection extra_data Adding extra data
00037 
00038 Data in the \ref navicom::navicom::NaviCom "NaviCom" class are represented in the \ref navicom::navidata::NaviData "NaviData" format, which is a matrix of data that can be indexed by row and column names. \ref navicom::navidata::NaviData "NaviData" objects can be created independently and integrated to a \ref navicom::navicom::NaviCom "NaviCom" object:
00039 \code
00040 extra_data = NaviData(data_matrix, row_names, col_names)
00041 nc.bindNaviData(extra_data, "extra_data")
00042 \endcode
00043 
00044 \section visualisation Data visualisation
00045 
00046 The \ref navicom::navicom::NaviCom "NaviCom" class provides several method to display the data in NaviCell:
00047     \li \b display Generic display function to perform any kind of personnalised display
00048     \li \b displayOmics Display -omics data as map staining with extra information or data on using the other display modes
00049 
00050 """
Generated on Wed May 27 2015 16:34:48 for navicom by  1.7.1
